translated: The Guide
. The Section on the Analyses

analyzed: tattha saṅkhepataḥ na itti kitti tā
translated: Herein, the Guide is proclaimed in brief.
. The Brief Guide
The gratification, the danger,

analyzed: nissaraṇam pi ca phalam upāyaḥ ca
translated: The escape, and the fruit, and the means,
And the Exalted One’s injunctions,
Are the nutriment of the meditator’s teaching.
What is asked and what is answered,
And the summary of the sutta,
The investigation of the sutta,

original: Hāro vicayoti niddiṭṭho.🔽Sabbesaṁ hārānaṁ,🔽Yā bhūmī yo ca gocaro tesaṁ;
analyzed: hāraḥ vicayaḥ ti niddiṭṭho  sabbesam  yā bhūmī yā ca gocaraḥ
translated: Is the analysis called investigation.🔽The plane and the province🔽Of all the analyses,
The scrutiny of what is appropriate and inappropriate,
Is the analysis called appropriateness.
The Victor teaches the Dhamma,
And the foundation of that Dhamma,
Thus, as far as all dhammas,
This analysis is called the foundation.🔽When one dhamma is stated,
Any dhammas that have the same characteristic,
All are stated,
This analysis is called the characteristic.
The ultimate, the intention,
The phrasing, and the reason for the teaching,
The connection in sequence,
This analysis is called the fourfold array.
In one foundation,
One seeks the remaining foundations,
It turns back on the opposite,
That mode is called the Revolving.
The Teaching and the basis,
This mode analyses the plane;
The common and the uncommon,

analyzed: raṇe ca na iyyaḥ vibhatti iti
translated: The analysis is to be understood.
The profitable and unprofitable ideas,
The taught, the developed, and the abandoned,
It turns back on the opposite,
That mode is called the Revolving.
But there are many synonyms
In the Thread for a single idea,
One who knows them, a Thread’s expert,
That mode is called the Synonym.
The Blessed One a single idea🔽Teaches with many descriptions,
That aspect is to be understood,
That mode is called the Description.
And the conditionally-arisen,
The faculties, the categories, the elements, and the bases,
One who descends by these,
That mode is called the Descent.

analyzed: vissajjitamhi pañhe  gāthā ayam pucchitā yam ārabbha
translated: When a question is answered,🔽In a verse, it is asked about what is the occasion,
The scrutiny of the pure and the impure,

analyzed: saḥ sodhanaḥ nāma  ekatta tāya dhammā
translated: That mode is called the Purification.🔽The ideas that are taught
As unity and as diversity,
They are not to be analysed,
This Mode is called ‘ Determination ’.
Those ideas which, by way of condition,
Produce other ideas, in sequence,
By drawing out the cause,
This Mode is called ‘ Requisite ’.
Those ideas which have a root,
Which have been shown by the One of Broad Wisdom to have a single meaning,
They should be combined,
This Mode is called ‘ Combination ’.
The Mode of Conveying a Conversion

original: Taṇhañca avijjampi ca,🔽Samathena vipassanāya yo neti;
analyzed: taṇham ca avijjam pi ca  samathena vipassanāya yaḥ na iti
translated: Craving and ignorance as well,🔽He converts by means of quiet and insight,
Having combined them with the Truths,

analyzed: ayam nayaḥ nandiyāvaṭṭaḥ  yaḥ akusale samūlehi
translated: This Mode is called ‘ Conversion of Delight ’.🔽He converts by means of the roots of unprofit

analyzed: na iti kusale ca kusala mūlehi
translated: And by means of the roots of profit,
The True Idea, the True Nature, the Untrue Nature,
This Mode they call ‘ The Threefold Staff ’.

analyzed: yaḥ na iti vipallāsehi  kilese indriyehi saddhamme
translated: He converts by means of the perversions🔽And by means of the defilements and faculties and the True Idea,
This Mode the one who knows the Mode
They call ‘ The Lion’s Play ’.
In the case of the grammatical terms
That are stated here and there as profitable and unprofitable,
He looks on with the mind,

analyzed: tam khu disālocanam āhu  oloketvā disa locanena
translated: This they call ‘ The Survey of the Directions ’.🔽Having looked on with the survey of the directions,
He converts whatever he has lifted up,
All the profitable and unprofitable,
This Mode is called ‘ The Hook ’.

analyzed: soḷasa hārā paṭhama  disa locanataḥ disā
translated: The sixteen kinds of Thread are the first,🔽Having looked at the directions from the direction-mark,
Having summarized with the goad,
The Thread is demonstrated by the three methods.
. The twelve terms

analyzed: akkharam padam byañjana  nirutti tathā iva niddeso
translated: Letter, word, and syllable,🔽And also expression, and demonstration,
And the sixth case, and the figure,
All this is the syllable.🔽The terms “rebuking”, “reproving”,
“Explaining”, “analyzing”, “elucidating”, “making plain”,
By these six terms
The meaning and the action are demonstrated.
And the three methods are not less,
And the six terms for the meaning are counted,
By the Blessed One’s nine terms
The meaning of the utterance is combined.
The nine terms for the meaning,
And the twenty-four by the search for the syllable,
Having combined both,
There are thirty-three of this Netti.
The chapter on demonstration.
